segments.text: I hate to do this , but I've got to cancel a reservation I made earlier this week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All I need is your name , phone , and reservation date .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My name is Rudy Randolph . I'm at 818-555-1234 . The reservation was for April 9 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Randolph , Rudy . Let me hit one button , sir , and now your reservation is cancelled .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , thank you . I'll make another reservation as soon as I can .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's been my pleasure to help you .
segments.speaker: S2
